title: I am alive.
abstract: Mikros Image was asked by Ubisoft to realize the trailer of the game I Am Alive. In this full-CGI project, the goal was to find a look to illustrate a "L'enfer au Paradis" theme. Over 30 artists collaborated on the trailer, which required almost 700 days to complete, occupied 750 Gb of disk space, and consumed almost 14,500 hours of calculation.
